response.overview: Comedies rule the roost in Kollywood. The latest film to join the comedy bandwagon is Yaanai Mel Kuthirai Savari. Sources say that the film is being directed and produced by Karuppiah Murugan. The film that stars Naan Kadavul Rajendran will not have the actor playing a villain. Instead, he will attempt to play a romantic hero. The film will also feature Archana Singh, Saminathan, Vazhakku En Muthuraman, Krishnamoorthy and Nandkumar. Says a source, “The film is about people who believe that giving up even before trying to accomplish a task is the height of foolishness. So, they set out to accomplish a task that is way beyond their capabilities.” The film will have music by Imalayan.
response.title: Yaanai Mel Kuthirai Savaari
